comments.body: We should have a clientConf as well, right-- as per the discussion earlier about admin client security configs

It would probably be good to have a separate paragraph to describe the group configuration.

We probably want to mention that if individual partitions are specified, only a single consumer is supported, and subscribe is not used.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +71,75 @@ * explicitly specifying partitions in "activeTopics" when there are multiple "threadsPerWorker"
 * and a particular "consumerGroup" will result in an #{@link ConfigException}, aborting the task.
 *
 * An example JSON representation which will result in a consumer that is part of the consumer group "cg" and
 * subscribed to topics foo1, foo2, foo3 and bar.
